text: John Stevenson (born 1958) is a British animator, film director and puppeteer. He has over 40 years of experience with animation. == Filmography == Year Title Director Producer Notes 2008 Kung Fu Panda Co-directed with Mark Osborne 2018 Sherlock Gnomes 2024 The Ark and the Aardvark Co-directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff == Other websites == * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:British animators Category:Movie directors from London Category:Puppeteers
title: John Stevenson (director)
